discourse_list.title: Overview of RWA-related SPFs and Funding Requests

content.content: Updated 12-Jan-2023 Hello, Attn: @Recognized-Delegates, to regroup and summarize various SPFs for RWA initiatives, please find the table below, which we will update through edits over time:  SPF Disbursements Specific approval for fund draws from surplus buffer on top of existing DAO budget.     SPF Amounts Forum Thread Governance Author Purpose Status of work     MIP55c3 SP6 50,000 Forum thread Accepted @adcv Legal Domain Work on Greenlit Collateral (bIBTA) Special Purpose Fund Not drawn yet, waiting for clarity on withholding tax treatment of IBTA in Swiss custody, expecting a response by end of January latest   MIP55c3 SP8 30,000 requested, 27,250 used, 2.75k returned Forum thread Completed @adcv Legal Work on MIP65 Outcome   MIP55c3 SP9 285,000 requested, 211,000 used, 47k returned Forum thread Completed @aes Legal and Commercial Risk Domain Work on Greenlit Collateral BlockTower Credit (RWA Arranger) SPF Outcome   MIP55c3-SP12 209,000 requested Forum thread Voting @aes This SPF provides funding for onboarding a structured finance consultant and legal counsel to perform commercial and legal risk analysis on RWAs greenlit by MKR holders and in consideration for onboarding.    MIP55c3-SP13 500,000 requested Forum thread Voting @Hajive This MIP will set up a Special Purpose Fund of 500k DAI to fund a set of RWA projects to be undertaken by the Viridian Cluster within the 6-month period of Jan 2023 - Jun 2023.    TBD TBD TBD TBD @adcv Further legal domain work on Greenlit Collateral (bIBTA) Special Purpose Fund #2  Pending SP6    Please let us know your thoughts and comments on this thread.
Wow! This is the definition of a quick turnaround. Muito obrigado!
Missing the one to CES, could you keep the list up to date across the whole DAO? Collateral Onboarding Project-based Funding Request (PFR) - Collateral Onboarding - The Maker Forum (makerdao.com)

adcv:  Legal review complete and legal assessment to be posted on Friday, Sept. 9th provided outstanding question is adequately addressed.   Thank you for the update–looking forward to seeing the post for the legal assessment of MIP65. Also, hopefully SF can put together a call to keep the community updated (if possible/when possible)–or, it can get an update via the Collateral mngmt/status calls. Thnxs again.

rspa:  Missing the one to CES, could you keep the list up to date across the whole DAO? Collateral Onboarding Project-based Funding Request (PFR) - Collateral Onboarding - The Maker Forum (makerdao.com)    Reflected     flipflopflapdelegate:  Also, hopefully SF can put together a call to keep the community updated (if possible/when possible)–or, it can get an update via the Collateral mngmt/status calls. Thnxs again.   Collateral calls sounds like a suitable venue but if needed we will be happy to provide separate updates.

flipflopflapdelegate:  Thank you for the update–looking forward to seeing the post for the legal assessment of MIP65.   My apologies for posting on a Saturday, but the North Lakes Legal review is here.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
